settings.editor: Since Day 1 , living being starts learning. How about learn something and make great discoveries? So,lets get going. All the best!

settings.description_text:
We are learning daily being assistance is necessity . You are currently viewing the open learning platform where you can access knowledge from mentors worldwide absolutely free of cost. You are getting these for FREE ,only to make your future better, easier and comfortable and help make great projects to showcase your talent and endeavor the unexplored.
So, Lets learn and explore to make more discoveries .
Lets evolutionize.

settings.editor: One who can understand the need as he works as he is keen to learning and get them easier.
One who can not only focus on what is needed but also can get to work to get hold of what is need to discover.
Just the person who can took the first step and help us evolve.
The one who is good in making contacts which help us get more resources and also form a community .

We know about the hectic daily schedule. We do know the way you truly understand a subject is by getting your hands on them. Which is why we've set an arena that's full of hours of exercises, questions and quizzes for your better memorizing.
In addition to recorded lectures, we also have a wide variety of pdf books on offer.  Here you'll be able to read even the most difficult to get books.
We are students who came across various obstacles and learned the drill of gathering books and lectures. This is why we came together to help everyone who is in need.

settings.description_text: Help the growing talents by saving their time.
We are based in India with our members around the globe.
